mapper.sql: distribute_id, activity_name, activity_type, activity_id, user_id, username, apply_time, discounts_money, discounts_prize, settlement_time, status, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, target_money, disabled,delete_flag,member_pay_level,qualification_activity_id, sole_identifier,statis_item,withdraw_dml,statis_start_time,statis_end_time,get_way
mapper.insert: insert into activity_distribute (activity_name, activity_type, activity_id, user_id, username, apply_time, discounts_money, discounts_prize, settlement_time, status, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, target_money, disabled,delete_flag,member_pay_level,qualification_activity_id,sole_identifier ) values (#{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{discountsMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountsPrize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlementTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{targetMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{memberPayLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{qualificationActivityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{soleIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update activity_distribute
activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
discounts_money = #{discountsMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
discounts_prize = #{discountsPrize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settlement_time = #{settlementTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
target_money = #{targetMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_pay_level = #{memberPayLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qualification_activity_id = #{qualificationActivityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sole_identifier = #{soleIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where distribute_id = #{distributeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activity_distribute set activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_type = #{activityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, discounts_money = #{discountsMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discounts_prize = #{discountsPrize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settlement_time = #{settlementTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, target_money = #{targetMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disabled = #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_pay_level = #{memberPayLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qualification_activity_id = #{qualificationActivityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sole_identifier = #{soleIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where distribute_id = #{distributeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT mal.id activityId, mal.start_time startDate, mal.end_time endDate, qa.user_id userId FROM qualification_manage qa, member_activity_lobby mal WHERE qa.activity_id = mal.id AND mal.type=1
mapper.insert:
insert into activity_distribute (activity_name,activity_type,activity_id,user_id,username,apply_time,discounts_money, discounts_prize,settlement_time,status,remark,create_by,update_by,target_money, disabled,member_pay_level,qualification_activity_id,sole_identifier,statis_item,withdraw_dml, statis_start_time,statis_end_time,get_way) values
(#{item.activityName},#{item.activityType},#{item.activityId},#{item.userId},#{item.username}, #{item.applyTime},#{item.discountsMoney},#{item.discountsPrize},#{item.settlementTime},#{item.status}, #{item.remark},#{item.createBy},#{item.updateBy},#{item.targetMoney},#{item.disabled},#{item.memberPayLevel}, #{item.qualificationActivityId},#{item.soleIdentifier},#{item.statisItem},#{item.withdrawDml}, #{item.statisStartTime},#{item.statisEndTime},#{item.getWay} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time = sysdate()
mapper.select:
select from activity_distribute where delete_flag = 1 and status <> 0
order by status,apply_time desc
SELECT SUM(discounts_money) subtotal FROM activity_distribute WHERE status = 2 LIMIT (#{pageNum}-1)*#{pageSize},#{pageSize}
SELECT SUM(discounts_money) aggregate FROM activity_distribute WHERE status = 2
